column4: i have an aver one 722 with win7 and ubuntu..all of a sudden when i boot it shows me the acer(bios) screen then shows a flashing-random color screen. any ideas?
not many quick steps to fixing grub unless you've made a repair disk
oh ok...i do have a bootable usb with 10.10
You can try to reconfigure it but you may have to simply reinstall
Know though, when it's up again to make a repair cd
i guess if the grub reinstall doesnt work i could reinstall OS's
try that link, if that doesn't help (which it should) then you can try a reinstall but that means something bigger happened.
i accidentally closed out before I clicked the link so i lost it
